Scan the products even when you are offline so as to add them to Open Pet Food Facts later. The scanned products will appear here and you will be able to send them using the button below.

Informasi mengenai alergi anda tidak akan dikirim ke server Open Food Facts. Juga, berhati-hatilah terhadap data produk yang mungkin tidak akurat, dan hasil deteksi mungkin tidak 100% akurat, mohon cek kembali!
